job_history.work_description: Management of all IT Applications (Administrative, Clinical, Revenue Cycle, Ambulatory, Ancillary). Manage $5M budget. Evaluate organizations IT needs, create strategic plan and implement new projects. Negotiation: Saved over $250,000 when purchasing new products. Manage staff: 7 Application Analysts, 2 Team Leads and 2 Consultants.
Project management, product evaluation and contract management. Saved over $75,000 by negotiating price when purchasing new products. Introduced project management methodologies.

Prepared project plan for implementation of computerized physician order entry, ordersets (Zynx), physician and nursing documentation, e-prescription, clinical portal, single sign-on and Meaningful Use Stage 1 initiative.

Managed $5M budget. Prepared project plan for implementation of computerized physician order entry, ordersets (Zynx), physician and nursing documentation, e-prescription, clinical portal, single sign-on and Meaningful Use Stage 1 initiative.

projects.description: Implementation of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) system in Registrar Office.
Implementation of computerized physician order entry, ordersets (Zynx), physician and nursing documentation, e-prescription, clinical portal, single sign-on and Meaningful Use Stage 1 initiative.
Implementation of EHR in Labor and Delivery department (Philips TraceVue fetal monitoring and documentation system).
Implementation of EHR in Cardiology department (CardiacScience Pyramis).
Migration of interface engine (from HL7 connect to Summit Interface engine).
Implementation of standalone version of e-prescription and prepared project plan for its integration with EHR (Meditech).
